content: and draw up a loop twice yo and pull through all 5 loops on hook 5 times 6 stitches total for the round f if the fr has stretched out then pull on the slack yarn to tighten it g insert hook into next st draw through a loop before pulling this loop through to make a slip_stitch take this time to make sure the center of this round puffs out towards the right side pull working yarn to help this round puff out even more pull first loop through second loop on hook to secure the round round 2 h loadtrtr double_crochet in 2nd pull through from hook * yo insert hook and draw up a loop through the 2nd pull-through from the hook yo skip 1 pull through and insert hook into next pull through and draw up a loop 5 loops on hook yo pull through 2 loops 4 times repeat from * 1 more time double_crochet in 2nd pull through from hook ch1 i wedge in next st ch1 5 times 6 petals started j insert hook through the horizontal strand at the top of the 1st stitch on the next petal and then underneath the slack yarn yo and draw through a loop continue pulling this loop through the loop on the hook to complete a slip_stitch round 3 k loaddtr dr in same st 2 dr in each of next 4 sts 10 sts worked on this petal ch2 l skip ch1 dtr in first st of next petal dr in same st 2 dr in each of next 4 sts ch2 5 times m insert hook through the horizontal strand at the top of the 1st stitch on the next petal and then underneath the slack yarn yo and draw through a loop continue pulling this loop through the loop on the hook to complete a slip_stitch 5 1st row of flower motifs foundation row 1 first flower a wfrs b first petal restoredr3tog dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog over the next 3 sts ch5 c wedge in next ch2 space ch5 d 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog in the next 3 sts ch5 wedge ch5 2 times e 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog in the next 3 sts ch5 f breakaway to next flower 2 for the next 9 flowers a wfrs b first petal restoredr3tog dr in the next 4 sts lastdr3tog over the next 3 sts c ch2 skip 2 petals behind hook slip_stitch into next ch5 space ch2 d wedge in next ch2 space ch5 1st-dr3tog over the first 3 sts of next petal dr in the next 4 sts 2nd-dr3tog ch5 3 times e breakaway to next flower f repeat from step 2a until a total of 10 flowers have been started on this row return row 3 for the current and the next
